name: Broken Tank
description:
Broken game is an arcade shooter where the controls of the player change every 10 seconds. Can you survive and kill as many monster as possible to get the highest highscore?

The only thing you need to play the game is a mouse.

The music was made by Hendy marvin

Don't forget to tell me your higscore and feedback in the comments and have fun!

Made for the GMTK Jam in 48 hours
